title: Unified Field Theory via Discrete Cymatic Substrate: A Two-Parameter Framework Deriving All Physics from Planck Bubble Dynamics
description: We present a unified framework where all physical phenomena emerge from discrete oscillators (Planck bubbles) on a 2D substrate. From two parameters (β_P, R_max), we derive: quantum mechanics, gravity, particles, dark energy, and consciousness. The framework makes five falsifiable predictions, including dark energy evolution (ρ_Λ ∝ 1/t) testable by 2045. This is an alternative physics framework presented for scientific scrutiny and experimental falsification.
notes: ALTERNATIVE PHYSICS FRAMEWORK - This is a theoretical framework in alternative physics presenting a discrete ontology for spacetime. It reduces 25+ parameters of Standard Model + ΛCDM to 2 substrate constants. Five experimental predictions are provided, three testable with current technology. This work is presented for scientific scrutiny and is intended to be falsifiable through experimental tests.
method: Theoretical derivation from phenomenological substrate parameters. Computational validation via NumPy simulation. Comparison with experimental data (electron g-factor, Newton's G, cosmological observations).
